Offense Playing Time
Cardinals, Bills, Chargers have played most time leading by 2 possession. WFT, Jets, Lions Offense have never played leading by 2 possession.
Browns have played most time in close game.
Bengals played just 21 plays trailing by 2 possession.

Where might we expect Najee and the #Steelers to target when it comes to running the ball? #Bears are averaging giving up 125 rushing yards per game, good for 24th in the league. Teams have found most success through the end gap, averaging a whopping .496 EPA per run. #nflverse https://t.co/IZ7RznX7nT

RBs: Lots of carries, low yards

Though it's a small sample size, Goff does seem to be getting sacked a tad deeper than usual. Discussion point among Lions' fans about how much the o-line (esp. tackles) is to blame, particularly with deep dropbacks. @PrideOfDetroit #nflverse https://t.co/HCO7MS3zwO
